description: A C4 model for the Midas Financial Accounting Software

people.name: User not assigned a role yet; pending application

components.description: This component will allow users to navigate the web application.It will contain links to different areas of the web application. \
components.name: Navigation Bar

components.description: This component will allow users to log into the system.                                         It will check the user's credentials against the userDatabase and return a token which will be used to authenticate the user.
components.name: Login Webpage

relationships.description: routes to when forgot password button is clicked
routes to if create new user button is clicked

components.description: This component will allow users to reset their password. It will prompt the user to enter their email address, userId, and answer a security question.
components.name: Forgot Password Angular Component

components.description: This component will allow users to view and edit their profile.                                         It will allow users to change their password, email, and other information.                                         Should fulfill R#1.
components.name: User Profile Angular Component

components.description: This component will allow users to view a calendar of all their appointments.                                         It will allow users to view, edit, and delete appointments.                                         Should fulfill R#2.13 by displaying a popup calendar when clicked.
components.name: Calendar Angular Component

components.description: This component will allow users to view all alerts and messages.
components.name: Inbox for all alerts and messages

components.description: This component will serve as a landing page for each user after logging in.                                         It will display a summary of all useful and important information.
components.name: Dashboard View

components.description: This component will allow users to access help documentation. It will display a list of common issues and solutions.
components.name: Help Feature

components.description: This component will allow users to view the status of their application.                                                 It will show any issues that the administrators have with the application.
components.name: Application Review

relationships.description: retrieves application information and status from
retrieves application information and status from

components.description: This component will allow users to apply for an account. It will prompt the user to fill out a form with their information.
components.name: User Application

relationships.description: sends email to administrators with user application

components.description: Displays options to review applications, view user profiles, and view Expired Password Report.
components.name: Admin User Control Panel

components.description: This component will allow administrators to view a table of all users who have applied to use the system. They will be able to view the user's application and either approve or deny the application.
components.name: Admin Application Review

components.description: This component will allow administrators to view a user's profile and edit any information. They will be able to change the user's role, password, and any other information.
components.name: Admin View User Profile

components.description: This component will allow administrators to deactivate a user's account. They will be able to view a user's profile and deactivate the account.
components.name: Admin User Deactivation

components.description: This component will allow administrators to view a report of all users who have expired passwords.
components.name: Admin Expired Password Report

components.description: This component will allow administrators to access the add, view, edit, and deactivate account functions.                                         Should fulfill R#2.1 by giving access to add, view, edit, and deactive account functions.
components.name: Admin Account Portal

components.description: This component will allow managers to access the view and edit account functions.
components.name: Manager Account Portal

components.description: This component will allow accountants to access the view account function and journal entry form.
components.name: Accountant Account Portal

components.description: This component will allow administrators to edit an account.
components.name: Admin Account Edit

components.description: This component will allow administrators to add an account.
components.name: Admin Account Add

components.description: This component will allow administrators to deactivate an account.
components.name: Admin Account Deactivate

components.description:
This component will store all money data in a specific format. 
 Should fulfill R#2.3/4
components.name: Money Data Format

components.description:
This component will display all accounts and route to any accounts clicked. Must have a search and filter feature. Should allow emailing of users from userId. 
 Should fulfill R#2.7/8/11/12 && R#3.3/4/19
components.name: Chart of Accounts

components.description: This component will display all details of an account.
components.name: Account Ledger

components.description: This component will display event logs for each account selected.
components.name: Account Event Log

components.description: This form should allow authorized users to fill in information for a journal entry. Debits come before credits and must equal each other. There may be multiple debits and/or credits.
components.name: Journal Entry Component

components.description: This component will allow users to review journal entries. Will allow managers to accept or deny submissions. Will filter/sort by status and date.
components.name: Journal Entry Review

components.description: This service will hold the user model and link the authentication object for each user to the proper user data.
components.name: Midas User Service

relationships.description: links user authentication to user data with

components.description: This service will interface between the web application and the firebase project. It will handle user information linking
components.name: Firebase Service for API Interaction

components.description: This service will handle all interactions with the firestore database. It will handle all CRUD operations for the database.
components.name: Firestore Service

components.description: This model represents all user data. User service will use it as a template for all user data.
components.name: User Model

components.description:
This component will store user information. on all users who have applied to use the system. 
 Fulfills R#1.11/13/15
components.name: Firestore Database for User Information

components.description:
This component will store all account information.                                         It will store information on all accounts and journal entries. 
 Fulfills R#2.1/2/5/6/7/8/15 and R#3.6
components.name: Account Server

components.description: Firebase Authentication will provide secure authentication for the web application.
components.name: Firebase Authentication System

name: MidasC4
